Header: India to work with Sri Lankan Prime Minister
Content: Media reports say that India is prepared to work with any Prime Minister in Sri Lanka in the best interest of both the countries. Sources at the Indian Foreign Ministry said that Indiaâ€™s goal was to continue and maintain to foster a strong relationship with Sri Lanka in light of the progress made so far. An official told the Sunday Morning Newspaper that India was watching the present situation in Sri Lanka very closely. India has a long standing relationship with Sri Lanka. The officials has said that despite the ups and downs, India wishes to continue to work with Sri Lanka, irrespective of who leads. In addition India believes that democracy and sovereignty will be maintained in the country.
